proposal1.heroHeadline: Shida is burning $20,000 a year on manual proposals. Here is exactly where it goes.
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Right now, Shida spends hours crafting proposals. With our system, it's done in 47 seconds.
proposal1.problemsIntro: Shida is experiencing significant ongoing losses due to their current manual proposal process.

problems.title: Wasted Hours
problems.description: Shida spends an average of 5 hours per proposal. That's 20 hours a week not spent on design work. This bleeds $1,000 weekly in lost opportunities.

problems.title: Missed Deadlines
problems.description: Complex proposals take longer than expected. Delay means losing client trust and potentially $2,500 in missed projects monthly.

problems.title: Inconsistent Branding
problems.description: Each proposal requires manual adjustments. Leads to brand inconsistency, costing $3,000 annually in lost brand value.

problems.title: High Error Rate
problems.description: Manual entries lead to errors. Errors in 20% of proposals lead to $2,000 in lost clients per quarter.

problems.title: Low Conversion Rates
problems.description: Manually crafted proposals fail to fully capture client needs. Results in a 10% conversion rate, losing $5,000 in potential revenue each month.

problems.title: Employee Burnout
problems.description: Overworked team due to proposal demands. Leads to high stress levels and $1,500 in reduced productivity monthly.

proposal1.solutionIntro: Our AI system replaces Shida's current manual processes, cutting losses and boosting efficiency.

solutions.title: Automated Proposal Generation
solutions.description: Currently, proposals are crafted manually, taking valuable hours. Our system generates complete proposals in 47 seconds.

solutions.title: Consistent Branding
solutions.description: Brand consistency is hard to maintain manually. Our system ensures every proposal reflects Shida's brand perfectly.

solutions.title: Error Reduction
solutions.description: Manual entries lead to frequent errors. Our system reduces errors to near zero, maintaining client trust.

solutions.title: Client Insights
solutions.description: Understanding client needs is manual and time-consuming. Our AI analyzes client data instantly, tailoring each proposal.

solutions.title: Time Reallocation
solutions.description: Time spent on proposals is time lost on design. Our system frees up hours, letting your team focus on creative projects.

proposal1.whyUsIntro: Four reasons this works. Not marketing claims. Engineering facts.

whyUsCards.title: Speed
whyUsCards.description: Every hour your team spends writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This system gives those hours back. Lead data in, live proposal out, 60 seconds.

whyUsCards.title: Personalization
whyUsCards.description: Generic proposals get ignored. Personalized proposals close. The system reads each prospect's website and reflects their services, tone, and positioning back to them. Written from scratch, not templated.

whyUsCards.title: Ownership
whyUsCards.description: No monthly subscription bleeding your budget. No vendor deciding to raise prices or shut down. You own the source code, the infrastructure, and the data. Permanently.

whyUsCards.title: Support
whyUsCards.description: Personal onboarding, a video walkthrough your team can reference anytime, and one week of post-delivery support. You are not left figuring this out alone.

fearCards.title: You are probably thinking: our stack is complicated.
fearCards.sub: CRM, email, Sheets, Slack. The system connects to whatever you already use. No migration.

fearCards.title: You might be wondering if this breaks your current workflow.
fearCards.sub: It runs alongside everything you have. Nothing changes except the time you spend on proposals.

fearCards.title: You are concerned the output will not match your standards.
fearCards.sub: Revisions are part of the build. We configure, test, and refine until the output matches your bar exactly.

proposal1.teamIntro: Your point of contact. No handoffs, no account managers, no layers.

team.name: Ayush Chauhan
team.bio: Full-stack engineer specializing in AI automation for agencies and service businesses. Every engagement personally handled from architecture through deployment. 15+ systems built. Zero failed deliveries. Works async, ships fast.

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Kickoff (Async or Call)
process.description: We map your workflow, services, and current proposal process. Can be a 15-minute call or handled entirely over email. By the end, we have everything needed to configure the system.

process.title: System Configuration
process.description: The engine gets configured with your services, pricing structure, tone of voice, and brand standards. Every proposal it generates will sound like your best strategist wrote it.

process.title: Build and QA
process.description: Test proposals generated and reviewed against your quality bar. Refinements continue until the output is indistinguishable from what your team produces manually.

process.title: Deployment and Handoff
process.description: Deployed to production with full infrastructure. You receive a video walkthrough, documentation, and complete source code. From this point, the system runs without us.

proposal1.pricingIntro: Two options. Both are one-time builds. No subscriptions, no recurring fees. You own the source code and infrastructure permanently.

pricing.name: Proposal Engine
pricing.subtitle: // Core System
pricing.description: Custom proposal automation configured for Shida's services, voice, and pricing structure.

pricing.name: Engine + AI Chatbot
pricing.subtitle: // Recommended
pricing.description: Everything above, plus an AI sales assistant embedded in every proposal. Handles objections, answers questions, and books calls for Shida around the clock.
features: AI chatbot on every proposal page

proposal1.ctaHeadline: See this running on your actual proposals.
proposal1.ctaDescription: Reply here or email Ayush directly. He will send the onboarding form. Takes about 10 minutes and the build starts the same day. Custom-configured for Shida.

proposal2.heroHeadline: Transform Acme Corp's Brand with Expert Graphic Design.
proposal2.heroSubheadline: We will revamp your visual identity and marketing collateral to boost engagement and drive sales.
proposal2.problemsIntro: Acme Corp is losing potential revenue due to overlooked graphic design elements.

problems.title: Outdated Branding
problems.description: An outdated brand image can lead to a 30% decrease in consumer trust. Modernizing your branding is crucial to maintaining market relevance.

problems.title: Low Conversion Rates
problems.description: Ineffective design elements on your website can result in a 20% drop in conversion rates. This means potential customers are not taking action.

problems.title: Poor Visual Communication
problems.description: Without clear and appealing visual communication, you risk losing 25% of your audience's attention, leading to missed engagement opportunities.

problems.title: Inconsistent Marketing Materials
problems.description: Inconsistency across marketing channels can confuse customers, causing a 15% decrease in brand loyalty and retention.

problems.title: Subpar Digital Presence
problems.description: A lackluster digital presence can lead to a 40% reduction in online interactions, hindering your ability to reach a wider audience.

problems.title: Inefficient Project Timelines
problems.description: Delayed design projects can result in a 10% increase in operational costs and missed market opportunities.

proposal2.solutionIntro: Our solutions are designed to address these losses and elevate Acme Corp's brand.

solutions.title: Brand Identity Design
solutions.description: We will create a cohesive and modern brand identity that resonates with your target audience and enhances trust.

solutions.title: Website Design
solutions.description: Our team will enhance your website's design to improve user experience and boost conversion rates.

solutions.title: Marketing Collateral
solutions.description: We will develop consistent and impactful marketing materials to reinforce your brand message across all channels.

solutions.title: Project Management
solutions.description: Our efficient project management ensures timely delivery and cost-effectiveness, reducing operational costs.

proposal2.whyUsIntro: Shida stands out as a leader in professional graphic design services.

whyUsCards.title: Proven Expertise
whyUsCards.description: Our team has a track record of success, delivering top-notch design solutions that drive business results.

whyUsCards.title: Client-Centered Approach
whyUsCards.description: We prioritize your needs and tailor our services to align with your unique business goals.

whyUsCards.title: Data-Driven Results
whyUsCards.description: Our solutions are backed by data and insights, ensuring measurable improvements in your business performance.

whyUsCards.title: Innovative Design
whyUsCards.description: We stay ahead of design trends to provide you with fresh, innovative solutions that captivate your audience.

proposal2.teamIntro: Meet the team dedicated to your project's success.

team.name: Kenji Doshida
team.bio: Kenji leads strategy and client relationships, ensuring each project aligns with your business objectives. His experience in graphic design has been pivotal in driving successful outcomes for our clients.

proposal2.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Discovery & Research
process.description: We begin by understanding your brand, goals, and audience.

process.title: Design & Development
process.description: Our team crafts design concepts and begins development.

process.title: Testing & Feedback
process.description: We test designs and gather feedback to ensure alignment.

process.title: Launch & Support
process.description: We launch the final product and provide ongoing support.

proposal2.pricingIntro: Choose an investment option that best suits your needs.

pricing.name: Basic Package
pricing.description: Ideal for small businesses looking to establish a basic brand presence.

pricing.name: Standard Package
pricing.description: Recommended for businesses aiming for a comprehensive brand overhaul.

pricing.name: Premium Package
pricing.description: For enterprises seeking extensive design services and dedicated support.

proposal2.ctaDescription: Let's have a conversation about how we can help transform your business.

lead.company_description: From branding to custom websites and everything in between, Shida Studio is your one-stop shop for all your graphic design needs. Our team of professionals will keep you informed and involved throughout the entire process. Consider us an extension of your own 'in-house' design department.
lead.headline: Founder
